choices: Emily
Friend - Eliza
Friend - Cathy
Friend - Chloe
Witch - Claire
1.content:
This is just the background, thus will not relate too much with the characters, and this will probably determine if you like this or not. I hope you will enjoy reading this

The world is now cursed. Not long ago, as Emily was still enjoying her day of school, things changed. Dark cloud suddenly appeared in the sky, as if a storm is coming. The cloud becomes thicker and thicker, eventually the whole city is covered in darkness. To Emily, as the beginning, this was just a storm coming, even though it is oddly too fast. However, such change is happening all over the world at the same time. As the earth is being enshrouded by darkness, the clouds gets lower and lower. Within a few minutes, the dark clouds are over the top of the school buildings. Shortly, the whole school is enclosed by the clouds. Actually, the whole world is enclosed by the clouds. Just as Emily and her whole class are being nervous and trying to seek help from the teacher, the teacher disappears as if he has never appeared. Next, the boys in her class disappeared just the way the teacher did. As all the males and girls over the age of 28 has been gone - around 5 minutes after the clouds cover everything - the clouds become thinner. A couple of minutes later, all the clouds are gone. But same time, all the teachers and boys are no more in the school either. Emily, like other girl, shouts out her boyfriend's name, "Dave, Dave! Where are you!? C'mon Dave!" But no response seems to appear. As she is worried, she looked around and suddenly found out that words are appearing on the screen:
Girls, beauty, immortality, fairness, all what you want is coming! Appreciate this! I eliminated all what I do not like; now, it is time to build up our world; it is time to build up my playground, my park of ticklishness! From now on, nature will tickle you, especially your little feet. Be careful with that, Ha--Ha--Ha! No, "Ha--Ha--Ha" is probably what you will say soon. Enjoy your eternity here! My name? Call me Claire the powerful witch!
Then nothing more is displayed. But just as Emily finishes reading the words, she feels a slight tickle on the instep of her feet. As it is nearly the end of the spring semester, summer is coming. Emily is wearing her favorite flip-flops to school. She looks at her feet, but seeing nothing that is touching her feet. Also, since the sense of tickling is so slight that it does not affect her much. With the teacher in school no more, staying in the classroom is not necessary anymore. Emily decided to go out of the campus and see what Claire the witch meant by "eliminating all what she did not like". As she starts to walk; as her sole is no more tightly touching the sole of her flip-flop, a sense of tickling struck Emily's sole. The sudden tickle almost made Emily fall. "If my guesses are true......"

Ten Years Later

The world is messed up, because of Claire's curse. Only a few millions of people are still in the world. At the beginning of the ten years, young girls have not found out that there is a penalty for exposing their feet to the nature for too long. Until one day, a girl went camping with a few friends in a mountain lost her flip-flops during the trip uphill. She, at the beginning thought that it was fine not to have shoes on for some time. However, she senses a stronger and stronger tickle all over her feet since the moment she lost her shoes. Her friends did not take the girl's speech about the tickling feeling seriously, but regarded as "crazy", "non-sense". However, two days later, the girl who lost her shoes could not bear the tickling anymore that she laughed crazily, itching her feet to weaken the sense of tickling. Her friend finally decided to take care of her and sent her to a hospital nearby. However, on their way to the hospital, the girl starts to turn into an illusion, or in another word, an illusory image. Even right by the girl, her laughing sounds like from a place far away. Slowly, the laughing of her goes "farther and farther" and eventually faded away. But as the girl disappears, an image is sent to the girls nearby, an image that she is in a forest, with her arms and legs are chained to trees, her feet are bare, having only lingerie on, with floating feather all around her, tickling her. Occasionally, little fairies come and tickle her with their tiny fingers. Sometimes, even the grass and branches of the tree strokes her body and feet. Grass ties onto her toes so that her feet cannot move around to avoid the tickling. The girl was in great happiness but same time in pain. She is laughing but she would rather not to laugh. The image shocks the girls that were with the disappeared girl. They reported that to the hospital they were going to, and the hospital reported that to the temporary local government set up by young girls. At first, no one believed in these girls, but later on, as more cases similar to the first one was reported, the gov. decided to take it seriously. Two years later, as more girls realize that exposing their feet to the air will end up being very pathetic, a mess started. Since the industry was all discarded after the "Witch Claire affair", clothes, shoes, and a lot of the normal goods becomes consumable goods and luxury. Fear among the girls make them robbing shoes off others' feet, and keep their feet covered securely in sneakers or boots. Distrust bursts out among the girls. Soon, flip-flops become very rare to the girls, as they are very unsecured and it is cannot fully stop the ticklishness from the air. Later on, flip-flops becomes a sign of power and wealth, as the girls with power and wealth do not truly afraid of getting their shoes robbed. Nowadays, people are more settled down and accept the reality that they are meant to be tickled. However, Emily and a few of her friends are still seeking a way to escape the madness. Finally, on the ten year anniversary of the "Witch Claire Affair", another sentence formed by clouds appeared, saying:
"All girls who oppose me, wanting to escape from you fate, come and defeat me, with my way - tickling!"
From that day, Emily and her friends went on the way of escaping their fate.
However, at the same time, with no one knowing, creatures meant only for tickling are created....

From whose perspective do you want to keep on the story?
1.title: Prologue

choices: A Red Slime
A red plant
a red goblin
some red ink
a piece of red paper with words on it
11.content:
Emily wakes up the next morning, wearing her underwear and her cute white ankle socks. Obviously, Emily lives a fairly good life even in this cursed world. In such a world that footwear is just so precious that it is the most expensive thing on the market. Still, Emily gets to keep a few pairs of sock, which can be interpreted as wealthy and unbelievable. Emily got herself some cereal as breakfast, and then started her plan about defeating the witch. She looked around, searching for a backpack or suitcase that is just the right size so that it is easy to carry but still but enough to contain all what her friends and she need. She had some food, water, a pair of long boots and a pair of flip-flops and a few pair of sock put in the backpack. To Emily, everything is ready; the only thing that still remains unknown how to find the witch. She had talked to her friend Eliza, Cathy and Chloe, and all three girls have hated the curse enough that they are willing to risk their ticklish body on this dangerous mission. Although she had no clue where exactly the witch is, depending on her sixth sense, Emil guesses that the witch should be somewhere near New York city. As living in New Jersey, close enough to New York, Emily suggests that she should probably drive to New York with her friends. After calling each of the three girls, a decision is made: All four of them will gather in a park near Emily's house, then come to Emily's home to take the car, so that they are able to drive to New York.
However, as Emily went out from the front door of her house, she senses something unusual. Girls on the street are running around, trying to keep away from some red things. After having a close look, it turns out to be.....
11.title: The start

choices: a pair of gloves
two hand-shape stamps
something that she does not recognize
111.content:
As Emily went by all the people who tried to run away and finally had a chance to look closely on the object, she noticed that the red object is a slime. To be honest, this slime looks somewhat cute. It is small, just the same size as a basketball, shaking slightly like a giant piece of jello. However, apparently, the slime is terrifying to all the girls around. About five feet away from the slime, a girl is so terrified that she is sitting on the ground, shifting away from the slime. Being confused, Emily determines to have a peek on this red little cutie thing. And she carefully moves to roughly a foot away from the slime, the slime suddenly moves the front half of its body, extending it rapidly to get Emily's left foot. Emily was stunned by the move of the "cutie" slime. When she tries to react, it is just too late. The slime has extended enough of its body to cover the instep of Emily's left boot. Emily tries kicking her left foot to get the slime away, but she failed miserably. As she found kicking a waste of time, she turns her head back and looks at the slime, thinking that she may find a way to get the slime off her boot. By now, the slime has extended its body so much that it covers Emily's whole left foot, but same time, its so extended that it becomes a lot more transparent than before. Looking at what is inside the slime, Emily finds two things interesting - a nike sneaker and two hand-looking items. Since the slime has a scarlet color and its body is very much stretched, it is quite hard for Emily to figure out what the hand-looking things are. However, that is not too good of a time to do research on what is inside the slime, for the slime's stretched body has climbed to nearly the top of Emily's left boot. Emily is not sure what the slime wants to do, but she is nervous - who knows what may happen in this messed-up world. But life just happen give special care to Emily all the time. An accidental glace and the girl that is shifting away from the slime gave her a idea what the slime want to do. It is her boot! The glace at the girl's feet gave Emily one clue - the girl has only a pink ankle sock on, but on the other foot she has a nike sneaker just like what is inside the slime. The slime is clearly not very strong to rip apart or disolve her boot, but it can totally go to the zipper and zip off her boot. Emily panics, for finding the clue about what the slime is going to do does not help her with solving her problem. Contrarily, Emily is so afraid of getting her boot off, show her cute little foot and get tickled that she cannot think calmly anymore. At this very moment, she did something insane, something that a normal person would never do - I am saying that sometimes terror is very powerful, and it can lead to positive result. Emily bents down, putting both of her hands into the body of the slime. Suddenly a great tickling on her arms and hands strikes her. It was so strong that even in a dangerous situation like this, the corners of Emily's mouth rises up - she barely stops herself from bursting into laughter. Her hands get deeper into the slime, and eventually she successfully touches the hand-looking thing inside the slime. Oddly, the slime trembles; its whole body suddenly leaves Emily's left boot and tries to get away from those hands. Right before this moment, the slime has already reached the zipper and it is half way down the boot. With all such happening in just a few seconds, everyone is stunned and confused. Same as Emily. Without realizing what is truly going on, she grabbed the hand-looking items and pulled them out. A loud screaming sound comes out from the slime; the next moment, the slime melts into a tiny pool of scarlet water.
It is not until one minute later before Emily awake from her madness. The girl on the ground has been gone, so has the nike sneaker that was in the slime. Shaking her head, Emily decides to just forget what happened. But the things on her hands tell her that what happened just now were totally real.
Looking at the items on her hand, she realizes that they are....
111.title: A Red Slime

choices: Reader's Choice
Reader's Choice
1111.content: But not just any pair of gloves, her friend's pair of gloves. Shaken by what she found she wanted to turn back, but she knew that she had to keep going. As she did, she got closer and finally saw another room, which led into...
1111.title: a pair of gloves

choices: The vines catch emily and she is tickled without mercy
Emily dodges the vines just in time
The  girl pushes Emily out of the way and is tickled in her place
112.content:
Emily's eyes widened as she saw girls running and screaming from strange red plants that had sprouted up over night. They were large and bulbous, almost like catcher plants, with large flower like middles, and lashing out at the running girls with long, feathering looking vines and it seemed the instant a girl was caught, she was wrapped up and instantly sent into a fit of laughter and giggles, as if just being touched by the vines was ticklish! She than watched a recently captured girl, who was flaling like crazy at the ticlking, was stripped nude and slowly dragged towards one large bublous flowers, and Emily swore she saw a tounge come out of the plant and lick it's "lips" as the girl drew near. The poor girl was in hysterics, screaming with laughter and yelling "nooooohohohohohoho please...Please no!" She yelled as thevines droped her into the "mouth of the Plant and she was promptly swallowed whole! Emily Gasped at the sght and wodered what in the hell was going to happen to the poor girl....

"Run you idiot!" A passing girl yelled at her. "Don't you see! Those things are capturing us and collecting us!" "C...Collecting?" Emily asked

"yes! They are rounding us up and tickling us into submission! They want to "eat Us" so they can send us to tickle hell! Once they get you there's no escape... So many girls have been swallowed whole already!" She pointed to the stem of the plant that had just swallowed a girl and Emily noted it was still wiggling as if the girl was being tickled on her whole way down into the ground, where no doubt a digestion pod awaited her.... but knowing this world, Emily imagined it as more of a tickling pod than digestion...

Emily looked at the girl she was running with. "What happens if they swallow you...."

"You didn't hear the announcement? Clara sent them... If you are swallowed it's a one way ticket to tickle hell...You never escape as the roots below tickle you into submission and you beg to be sent to Clara's dungeons in the tickle hell..." She sighed. "I've lost so many of my friend...."

Emily took pity in the girl and was about to say something but was cut off as they almost ran right into the waiting vines of one of the plants!
112.title: A red plant

choices: Escape!
Take the hallway
Try and fight the plants
1123.content: Emily is pushed out of the way as the girl is captured and tickled. "Haahahahahahaahhahhahahahahahahahaha! Plhehehehehehehehehehese, save yousehehehehehehehehehelf!" She was then 'collected' by the plant and sent to tickle hell. Emily runs away and come across an exit and a hallway.
1123.title: The  girl pushes Emily out of the way and is ti...

choices: Get's a Phone Call from One of Her Friends.
Takes a Nap, and Waits for the Storm to Pass.
Another Ticklish Encounter...
115.content:
Emily could see plenty of red papers floating down from the sky, and lots of girls running from them in panic. She was confused by the paper, how could red paper cause such a panic to everyone. Emily caught one of the papers in her hand and read it.

Why Do You Fight The Ticklish Pleasures of Life? Why Do You Live To Avoid The Gift I've Placed In The Air? Why Not Take Off Your Footwear & Accept? Why? Why? Why? But Enough Of That, Ten Years.... It's Close To Our Anniversary, Why Not Celebrate Together? In A Weeks Time, It Will Have Been Ten Complete Years... So Join In The Festivities, There Will Be A Party, All Are Welcome, Please Stop By For A Drink, & Have A Laugh.... Hahaha.... I Know You Want To Be There, Emily.... ~Claire, The Powerful Witch

Emily was startled on how here name magically appeared, she looked at her boots, that covered her feet. Emily thought to herself to stick to the plan, New York was still the destination. As she finished clearing her thoughts, a tingling feeling covered her hand that held the red letter. Her serious complexion, turned into a grin, and a smile washed over her face. Emily quickly figured, it was the letter making her laugh, she tried to throw it, but her hand only clenched it. That caused the tickling sensation to increase. Her own hand was betraying her, the papers could be seen flying towards the girls in fast speeds. Then a sudden realization hit her, the red papers were somehow alive and trying to find a victim to tickle. Emily giggled at the hilarious feeling, and tried shaking the paper off, but while she attempted to rid herself of the ticklish burden, other red papers had seen her and flew at her hoping to hit her.

She figured to get back inside and wait for the red paper storm to pass, she dodged the red papers, as they zipped by, nearly missing her. She opened the door in a panic, and shut it quickly, the sound of papers hitting the door could be heard. After that, she focused her attention on the red invite attracted to her hand, but noticed it was gone. The paper must of released her hand in the midst of the panic, but soon she knew it was hiding, and she looked cautiously around for any red sticking out. Emily knew this paper was going to hide well, until it saw an opening to get her. So with that, Emily needed bait, and she took a crazy risk. She slipped off her right boot, along with her sock. The cold air invaded her warm bare foot, she shivered at the sudden freezing in the house. Emily's home was equipped with a special filter that kept the contaminated air outside, that's why Emily only was barefoot in her home.

Emily waited for the red paper, she leaned against the door with her foot out in the opening, ready to be tickled. She wiggled her toes and waited... just then a familiar sound of paper in the house is heard, causing her to become alert. Suddenly, the red paper floats across from her, the paper sat on the other side of the room. Emily smiled, knowing her crazy plan was working, now to catch it. She put on a pair of gloves that she kept in her possession, and stared at the red paper.

"Oh no, my poor helpless, ticklish, bare foot is out in the open... What will I ever do? I hope nothing tickles my foot." Emily said, while she pretended to be a damsel in distress, "Look at those toes... I hope nothing tickles them..." She implied, and she wiggled her toes, she giggled at herself for doing this.

The red paper shot at her, and Emily moved her foot out of the way as the paper overshot it into Emily's gloved hands. Emily raced to the kitchen sink, and shoved it in the garbage disposal, grinding the red paper into a million pieces. Emily sighed, and placed her boot and sock back on. She walked to her room to lay down, and wait for the red paper storm to end.
115.title: Red Invites of the Future & A Ticklish Invite...

choices: The Storm was Still Raging
There was Someone in her room!
Author's Choice
1152.content:
Emily decided that the best thing to do in this circumstance was to simply wait out the paper storm, and considering she had nothing better to do, chose to simply take a nap. As Emily got ready for her nap though, she happened to look outside one of her windows an witness a terrible fate. Outside, in the raging storm, there was one poor girl who had the misfortune of not being able to find shelter. Her long and thin arms were covered in the red papers, causing the girl to cackle like mad as they sent ticklish impulses into her. It was not long before she collapsed on the ground, overwhelmed by the ticklish sensations. It was then that her own arms betrayed her; the papers took control of her arms, forcing them to reach down to her boots and slowly begin untying them. Emily could hear the brunette girl cry out for mercy and help as her own hands removed the laces from her boots and then the final shield that were he thick socks from her feet. Her hands then were able to do one last thing, namely tie her very own big toes together with her shoelaces before a hoard of the red papers decended on her bare and hyper-ticklish feet. Emily's own feet almost felt the ticklish sensations themselves just watching the poor girl explode into hysterics as the papers mercilessly tickled her feet.

But what really gave Emily a terrible fright was how that within minutes of the girl's feet being bombarded with the red papers, she started to fade away! It would seem that the "invitations" were quite literal: those red papers vastly accelerated the rate at which a girl would be summoned away to whatever hell the girls are sent to. As that poor girl dematerialized, Emily saw a vision of her tied to a revolving wheel, completely naked, with what looked to be like the shoelaces from her boots used to tie every part of her to the wheel. Every arm, leg, finger and toe was tied and impossible to move, and the girl cried out with horrible laughter as millions of red feathers brushed against every part of her body. And then, just as the vision had come, it had faded, and the girl was gone from this world.

Emily shirvered, deeply sorry for the girl, but took solace in the fact that she could have done nothing to help. To Emily, it only proved that this madness had to stop, at any cost. With that, Emily removed most of her own clothes and settled on her bed to nap through the remaining storm. But when she had awoken...
1152.title: Takes a Nap, and Waits for the Storm to Pass.

choices: Help The Poor Girl
Leave The Poor Girl To Be Tickled
11521.content:
The storm still raged outside, as lighting could be seen from the window along with the sound of thunder accompanying the bright flash that shined it’s way into the house. Emily yawned, looking around tiredly, and looking at her clock revealing the afternoon nearly passed. Emily sighed, as she looked at her self, with only a bra, and panties. Emily wasn’t one to always to take her socks off, but only when she felt completely safe, she always did.

Emily rose out of bed, noticing the house stood still while hearing the rage of the storm claim the outside, as she peeked through her curtains to see red papers still flying and passing by. She gave another sigh of annoyance as this pesky storm interrupted her plans, but also couldn’t stop thinking about the invite she had received earlier that day. She walked to the kitchen almost naked, hearing the sound of her own bare feet against the floor with a slapping sound.

Emily went to the kitchen to see the sink, where she had shredded the invite, but what she saw only shocked, and startled her. The invite had somehow repaired itself, and Emily jumped back, preparing for the paper to attack, but it only stayed still. Emily eyed it with suspicion, then she approached it with paranoia expecting the paper to attack.

Upon getting close to the paper, she examined it. Revealing that the red invite had changed its lettering, even changed from an invite to a letter. Emily touched the paper, noticing it must’ve died, or something, as it was an ordinary piece of paper now. She picked it up, reading it out loud.

“Dear Emily…..” She said with a worried tone. “I’m a friend who’s going to help you defeat, Claire, the witch.” The letter wasn’t a threat, but a letter of assistance to help her. “Yes, that’s right, help you, not harm you in any way, in fact I’ve watched you from afar, and you seem like the only one, along with your friends who wants to save this world, and rid it of the ticklish hell Claire has created.” Emily felt relieved to see help, but was concerned for if this was real or fake, but nevertheless she had to find this mysterious help. “You don’t know me at the moment, but soon we shall meet, and I will teach you things, bringing you closer to defeating the dreaded witch, I will send you another message when it’s time.”

Emily finished reading the letter looking around her home feeling strange, but finding nothing. She didn’t know what to make of the letter, only that it was a letter of help. Emily walked to her room, and got dressed slipping her socks, boots, and winter clothing feeling the cold air enter the house.

She sat down in the living room, but heard banging on the window of her home, then heard a scream of laughter. Quickly she sprang up, running to the window, seeing a girl fighting a couple of red invites. She seemed to holding off quite well, until more were jumping in, and taking the poor girl by surprise. Emily witnessed earlier a girl being taken by the ticklish invites, but soon her conscious debated to help or leave her on her own.

“Hahahahaheeeelllpppphahaha!!!” The girl screamed, while laughing in hysterics, as the invites attacked her relentlessly sending the ticklish impulses into her with great accuracy. The invites stuck to the girl, but with a fast motion, and quick reflexes this girl pushed them off with swiftness. She somehow lost her footwear, having being barefoot, but she managed to keep them off her feet, but for how long?

Emily paced back and forth looking at the poor barefooted girl doing her best to keep from falling into tickle hell, forever to be tickled. After five fast seconds of standing around thinking, Emily decided to…..
11521.title: A Surprise & A Damsel In Ticklish Distress

choices: Her passed out on the couch from exhaustion
Some red notes slipped into her house!
115211.content:
Making up her mind, Emily rushed to her door, her hands fumbling with the keys. Finally managing to get the lock open, she carefully opened the door, grabbing the giggling girl outside and pulling her in. Before closing the door, Emily used her hands to pry any red notes that she saw sticking onto the other girl's body, throwing them back into the storm of papers outside her door.

Finally making sure that there were no visible red papers left, Emily shut her door. Turning around to face the person she had just saved, she found...
115211.title: Help The Poor Girl

choices: A strange impulse comes over Emily... A need to tickle the girl...and her feet..
Emily gets up to get a blanket and some socks for the girl.
1152111.content:
Emily turned and saw that the poor girl had gone to lay down on her couch. Clearly exhausted from her ordeal outside, she'd gone right to sleep
Emily smiled, looking at her. She truly was cute, perhaps was no older than 18 (at least when all this had started).She had blonde hair, a very fair face and some of the cutest (if not a bit big, maube size 8) feet Emily had ever seen. She made a note to protect this girl and bring her along for her and her friend's quest.

Sighing she looked out the window, watching as the storm of invites contenuied. Watched as several girls fought with the letters in the distance, knowing full well there was little she could do for them, having already risked her neck for one girll... She watched as girls stared in horror as their friends were one by one "invited" to tickle hell by these horrible things... She wished she could help. but in her heart knew that once those things touched a girl's feet, it was too late. She shuddered and closed the blinds and turned her attention back to the sleeping girl on her couch. She sat on the arm of the couch and watched the girl for a minute...
1152111.title: Her passed out on the couch from exhaustion

choices: Emily see’s the women in her kitchen
Emily see’s the women laying in her guest bedroom
11521111.content:
Emily saw the girl just laying there helpless. “Emily thought could one tickle hurt ?”

NO! I can’t” Emily walked out of her sight letting the girl just lay there.

After going to her living room Emily sits down to watch some tv. However Emily looked down the hallway seeing the girls size 8 soles facing her.

Emily shakes her head “NO!”

As she turns on the tv to see what’s on she see’s the news.

A young women reporting the storm still going on outside
“As you can see these papers are attaching to women tickling them and control them to get to their feet advised please stay inside”
Suddenly the women it attacked by the papers “NOOO PLEASE HAHAHAHAHA”
The camera shows the papers attached to the arms of the poor women.
The no longer in control arms of women goes down to her boots taking off her laces.
“PLEASE HAHAHAHA IM BEGGING NOT MY FEET HAHAHA PLEASE!”
Finally her socks come off.

The papers flying around stop and see the beautiful size 8 feet and fly full force into them.

Emily tranced to see the women crying and laughing To see her feet being tickled and being transported to tickle hell.
Emily looks down the hallway to see the women still sleeping and says “fine”. She closes the tv. Walks up to the sleeping women. Examining the feet they got a light blue color to her toe nails.

Emily puts the feet in her lap “I can’t help it” she needs to tickle them.
Finally she does it doing small strokes down her sole not waking the girl but twitching her soles . Emily likes it and smiles “someone gots some hyper sensitive feet that are ticklish.” She removes them from her lap and gets up to get some lotion. She goes to her room for some lotion walks back. And she’s those beautiful ticklish feet. She sits on her ankles gently and applies the lotion to her soles making the girl move but not wake her up. Finally she does the final massage ready to tickle her but the women wakes up. “What are you doing and where am I ?”

“Oh I’m Emily and you were being attacked by the papers and I saved you before they could get to your feet. You fell asleep on my couch and I though your feet must hurt so I thought I could massage them.” Smiling as Emily said that.

“Oh um thanks,but could you get off?”
“Yeah sorry.” Emily gets off and the women stand up.
“Um the storms still going on why don’t you make
your self at home.”Emily tells the women.
“ oh ok thanks for saving me and ... massaging my feet”
The women walks away but Emily couldn’t help but stare at her feet saying under her breath “ I’m going to tickle them.”
Emily walks to see the women.
11521111.title: A strange impulse comes over Emily... A need to...

choices: Emily is able to break free and runs for it
Emily is powerless and the invites force her to remove her boots.
1152112.content:
Emily turned around to see, much to her horror, That some of the red letters had slipped in to the house!
She screamed and pointed at them. "LOOK OUT!" She yelled to the girl she'd just rescued, But it was too late. By the time the girl turned around to look, the letters were already upon her. She screamed out in laughing agony as they began clinging to her hands, Tickling her instantly and forcing her to remove her pants and shirt, leaving her in just her bra and panties. The invites immidatly clung to the girls exposed skin, Trying to get her to her knees. She screamed in agony at the ticlking sensationa nd looke dup at Emily for help but Emily was too frozen in shock at the sight.

Soon the girl was laughing so hard as her belly, Armpits and everything were being tickled and she was on her knees. "Haaaaaaaaalp meheheheheheehe!" She yelled between laughing... "Do...Doohohohohohohohhohohoon't Let them near my Feeeeheheheehet!" The girl was in tears at the tickling as some letters fast approched her bare and exposed soles.

Emily, Snapping out of her daze, Rushed to the girl and tried to pull the invites off her, but so much as touching them tickled way too much. Before Emily could do anything, a few stray letters clung to the girl's soles and toes, instantly driving the girl mad at the intense tickling. "I'm sorry...." Emily said as she backed off. "There's nothing I can do for you now...." she said with deep remorse as the girl rolled around in agony, covered in letters. Slowly she began to fade, being summoned to tickle hell. As she faded an image entered Emily's mind, the girl was laying on a table, almost completely mummified in black leather. Her feet and head were the only things exposed and her poor soles and toes were being raked with the fingers by many of the witch's minions. She was screaming as she slowly went mad from the tickling, becoming a slave to it. Emily knew that this was to be the girl's fate. To be tickled like this for all of eternity. Emily glared and vowed that no more would suffer like this as long as she could do something about it....
( http://www.tickling-submission.com/sites... )

As soon as the image had entered Emily's mind, it faded and the girl was gone. The invites than turned their attention to Emily. Instantlly they clung to her hands, Making her break into hysterics as they slowly reached for her shoelaces...
1152112.title: Some red notes slipped into her house!

choices: Emily told
Kept the secret
The bus arrived
11521121.content:
Emily started to bang her hands against the hard surface of the table. It did not hurt but tickled. The invites shattered to pieces. Once her hands were clear of them, the girl saw that her shoe laces were already opened. She kicked the shoes into a corner, sending the letters flying along. Emily dashed to the front door, squeezed her feet into outdoor boots, grabbed her emergency pack and left the house. The storm outside caught her instantly. Quickly she pulled a face mask over her head and put her gloves on.

Protected from the ticklish environment for now she knew she had to start her quest now to end the ticklish fate of the girls in her world, including herself. Her mind raced as she paced along. Where to start? Who would help her, and who would betray? Possible the poor girl who had just descended into tickling hell could help her with what she had left behind Emily remembered the girl's address. After a few minutes she arrived at a bus station.

Emily meanwhile arrived at the entrance of the tickling hell. The security guards of the witch quickly put her in restraints. Would she be able to hide Emily's state for some time or spill the information of resistance under tickle torture?
11521121.title: Emily is able to break free and runs for it

choices: She breaks free at last and begans ripping the invites up!
They remove her socks and tickle her feet, sealing her fate.
11521122.content:
Emily's eyes were filled with tears from the tickling and the despair as she watched her own hands untie her boots and remove them. "Sttop...Pleeeehehehehese.... Nooo..." She said to herself as the Invites began to undress her. They were being as cruel as they were ticklish, forcing her to undress slowly, first her shirt, leaving her ticklish tummy exposed, to which several invites clung to, sending her into hysterics as her belly was tickled without mercy. "Please...Please... I dohohohohon't want to be in tickle heeeeeeell!" She screamed through her laughs.

"why, my child...Why do you resist?" Someone said around her. Emily looked around as best she could but saw no one. "Why do you resist my gift of eternal joy? Of eternal happiness...."

"Thi....Thisheheheehehis isn't happiness...It's torture!" Emily said as the invites removed her pants and began tickling her knee joints, which made her bite her lip from the sensation.

"Torture? My dear child. I offer you eternal life. A life of endless bliss. Of laughter and love as you are lovingly and tenderly tickled for all of time. You will never know pain...Never know hunger...never know betrayel or hatred. Only eternal laughter.... eternal bliss...." The voice said rather coy like. "Don't you want that Emily? To be free? To be happy? Free of life's torments.."

"thi...This... This is torment...." She said as her hands, forced by the invites controling them, began reaching for her last line of defense... her socks... She knew once those were removed, her fate was sealed... Her feet would be horribly tickled by these monsters and that would be that. She'd be sent to tickle hell for all of eternity, failing her friends and the world...

"Surrender to me Emily....BEcome mine...Become a slave to the sensations...forever...."
11521122.title: Emily is powerless and the invites force her to...

choices: Emily wakes up chained to a bed
Emily wakes up chained to a table
115211222.content:
Emily's eyes widened large as her socks slipped off, exposing her small adorble, and very ticklish, size 7s to the invites. "NO!" She screamed out in vain as in an instant, an ivite latched onto her soles, another to her heels and one wrapped around each of her toes! She screamed and laughed at the extreme tickling, It fell like agony! It felt like hell! It felt...


Good... Strangely she was starting to enjoy the sensations as the invites mercilessly tickled her poor feet. Yes she was being tickled and it was forcing her to laugh, but she was starting to...enjoy it?

"There you go my child. Surrender to it! Embrace it! Soon my dear you will be laughing like this for all eternity! As my slave! You will be tickled and in turn tickle others! I've waited so long to get my hands on you, dear Emily, and now you and your lovely little treat feet are mine forever!"

Emily cried, yet also smiled as she felt herself fading away. She knew where she was headed...

She was going... to Tickle Hell. "I'm sorry...my friends." She said as she laughed and faded away....

Where does Emily's Fate take her? Choose her fate:

Option 1: She wakes up in the Queen';s personal bedroom, To be her personal Tickle slave (and possibly lover) For all eternity

Option 2: She wakes up on a table in the dungeon, a special treat for the Queen's most loyal servants to torment forever, and of course the Queen herself gets the first tickle.
115211222.title: Emily is sent to Tickle Hell

choices: Chloe agrees to play the witch's sick game....
Chloe refuses to play! She's not some toy!
Before Chloe can even answer, a ticklish trap comes after her
14.content:
Chloe was an insanely beautiful brunette girl, whom before all the tickling witch nonsense had started, was in her early 20's and, at no shock to anyone with her bod, had no trouble getting men to sleep with her and take her home for nights of "wild ticklish sex." See Chloe actually liked being tickled on her belly, sides and feet. But only by guys. It used to make her so horny when a guy would over power her and tickle her raw. But when the witch took over... there were no more guys to tickle her and it became less of a turn on and more of an ordeal. She didn't want to be banished to some tickle hell, never to see a hot guy ever again...

She missed those days, but more than anything else she missed the hunky guys she used to date. So it was no surprise that when she heard her friend Emily was starting a resistance that Chloe was one of the first to sign up. The constant tickling in this world was making her so uncontrollably horny that she needed to get it stopped. Other wise she might explode...

She was preparing for their journey when she heard a knock on her door. "That must be Emily." She thought as she went to the door.

As soon as she opened it, she got a full blast of some weird pink mist. Coughing and falling to her knees she started giggling and laughing. She fell to the ground writhing on the floor as her whole body was tickled from head to toe, despite being fully clothed. Soon she passed out and everything went black...

Hours later she woke up, feeling very groggy and looked around... Somehow she'd been transported to what looked like a locked room in a dungeon! She looked at her self and found that she was wearing only a pink bikini and all her super ticklish spots were exposed. She started to freak out... was this tickle hell? Would any minute that door in front of her open and she be dragged off to an eternity of tickling... the thought both terrified her and aroused her... But she shook the arousal thoughts off to try and figure a way out.

"Hello Chloe." A voice said suddenly.

"Who...Who's there... Please let me go!"

"All in due time my dear, all in due time... You and I are going to play a game, Chloe."

"What.... What kind of game?" the scared brunette asked.

"I've watched you and your friends for a long time Chloe...And I simply must have you all in my collection of writhing ticklish cuties. I want my fingers on your belly and feet BAD." Chloe instantly recognized the voice of the Witch!

"Never! We will never submit to you you sicko!"

"We shall see... What is it you desire most? Ah yes... To be tickled by a hot guy!" the witch laughed and than gagged. "Men are disgusting... Why want one of them to tickle you when you could have a goddess dance her fingers along your tender belly..."

Chloe said nothing and merely blushed a little.

"Anyway, the game. Behind that door is a maze. It a few seconds it will open and the game will begin. Your task is simple... Make it to the end of the maze in 24 hours."

"What's the catch?" Chloe asked, knowing it can't be that simple...

"The maze, my dear, is filled with ticklish traps meant to catch you and ensare you... Might be a hot guy or two in there,I'm not telling. But! Should you submit to one of the traps and be tickled for more than 2 hours. You are mine forever!you will be banished to my private collection in tickle hell and will be mine to play with for all eternity!"

"And if I win?" Chloe asked

"If you win, that I will let you and one friend of your choice leave... Not just the maze or whatever, but Leave my world. You will be sent where I sent all the men, free of the 'torment' for the rest of your misarble lives... It'd be such a shame though, to send such a hottie like you off to guys..." The withc sighed. "So...Shall we begin?"
14.title: Chloe's ticklish peril!

choices: Take a Nap, and Wait for her Assistant's Punishment to End
Look into her Crystal Ball
Try to Find a Victim to Play With
Reader's Choice
Reader's Choice
15.content:
A lady sat in the center of the room, looking into a crystal ball. Her eyes stared into the crystal, seeing panic, and hysteria from the multiple attacks she launched. Her grin, turned into a smile, as she would capture another victim. Her fingers scratched against the crystal ball, pretending it was a sole of a poor girl, she loved the anatomy of feet so much. The toes, arch, heel, and sole were a very beautiful thing, her thoughts were happy, and collected.

"I think I've seen enough tickling for the day..." The witch stated, while she put a cover over the crystal ball. She stood up, and stretched, then looked at her own bare feet. She never liked wearing any type of footwear, she enjoyed being natural and bare. Their wasn't a surface, her bare feet, hadn't touched. Her feet were well taken care of for a witch. She wiggled her toes on the floor, loving the feeling of her bare skin touching the smooth floor. "I don't know how anyone can wear suffocating shoes, or socks." She said to herself, while she admired her own perfect feet, not even nail polish touched her toes, for she preferred just keeping her toenails the way they are.

After admiring her feet, she continued through her home, looking at the mirror, she wore a black dress that had a very simple design. Her hair was flat, and perfectly straight, and finally her looks consisted of pure beauty. She was the ultimate desire of what many sought to be, and look like.

"I wonder where my assistant is?" Claire asked herself, just then she heard a door open, followed by a door closing. She smiled knowing who it was.

Her assistant ran in, breathing deeply. Her hair was messy, and her clothes seemed a bit messy, her boots were also covered in mud. "Magistra, please forgive me.... I didn't.... mean to be late..."

"Now, assistant... you're late by twenty minutes, what were you up to?" She crossed her arms, and changed her tone.

"I uhhh.... kind of lost your...." She hesitated, and stuttered.

"Out with it!!!" Claire demanded, with great impatience.

"I misplaced your beginners spell book.... so I was looking for it.... and when I checked the time.... it was time to...." She stopped talking, as soon as she saw an infuriating fire in her magistra's eyes.

"Remove your boots, and socks now!" She calmly said to her assistant with anger.

"Magistra.... please no...." She begged the witch, but only was given a glare that warned her to do it. In a quick haste she removed all her footwear, and was now barefoot just like her magistra.

"Now go to the stocks, and receive your punishment. Five hours of constant tickling, no rest. While you are laughing, think about how you're going to find my book. Now go!!" Claire ordered and sentenced her assistants punishment.

"I will.... magistra." She sadly said, disappointing her magistra made her feel horrible. She walked to the room, known as the punishment room, with a pair of stocks in the center. The room was very magical, once a pair of bare feet were set in the room, and in stocks. It would magically close and lock, then items would take turns tickling the victims feet. She entered the room, knowing what was going to happen. She placed her feet in the stocks, and quickly they closed and locked.

"Do your worst!!" She yelled, but now her feet were at the mercy of the room. She saw string quickly tie around her toes pulling them back against the board. Once that was done, she saw a feather glide to her feet. "One feather, I thought this room was scarier." She smiled, but then a swarm of feathers barraged her feet, engulfing her soles and attacking in between her toes, she broke into hysterical laughter, shaking her head, and attempting to move her feet.

"Have fun...." Claire said, while she giggled, and closed the door to the punishment room. Once the door closed, she heard the laughter of her assistant, and gave a small chuckle. "All in a day's work of tickling..."

Claire walked to her room, and jumped on the bed. She laid there thinking of what to do.
15.title: The Great & Powerful Claire!!!

choices: Follow The Assistant's Perspective
Follow Claire's Perspective
Reader's Choice
151.content:
"Magistra.... magistra.... wake up.... I've learned my lesson.... and look, I've found your book, magistra." A familiar voice said, as Claire opened her eyes, and rubbed them.

"Huh.... Assistant? You're done already? Have I slept that long?" Claire questioned in a tired voice, giving a yawn, while she sat up facing her assistant.

"Yeah, I finished nearly an hour ago, but I found your beginners book. And you've been asleep for about six hours... but hey! I still found your book!!!" She waved it in front of the witch, giving a smile, she was happy to find the book before her magistra awoke.

"Excellent, assistant... Now we must find a victim for you to practice on. Now go, and do this and report what you have learned." Claire ordered looking at her assistant who was still barefooted. As her assistant turned and left, she saw her soles were red from the five hours of constant tickling, Claire only grinned, the punishment was a nightmare for bare feet that were sensitive.

Claire looked at her toes, curling them, and remembering her first time experiencing the ticklish sensations, her body shivered at the thought. She knew the feeling of soles being exposed, and helpless, the feeling of fingers teasing the sensitive heels to the very tip of the toes. A playground in which your feet were right for the tickling, no rules, no mercy. That's how she remembered it, and Claire knew the feeling all too well. She then snapped out of the memories of the past, and looked up at the clock. It was an hour after noon, Claire felt the need to do some tickling of her own, while her assistant did some as well.

'Let's see I'm not sure what I want to do, but I wonder how my assistant is going to do? Well time will tell, she's still a beginner. In the mean time, what will I do?' Claire thought, sitting on top of the bed, while tapping her foot.

You can either stick with Claire's Perspective, or Follow The Assistant's Perspective, or Your Choice.
151.title: A Glimpse of Claire's Past...

choices: The Assistant Plans How To Get This Woman
The Assistant Feels Bad For This Woman, So She Doesn't Plan To Get Her
The Assistant Waits, Before Deciding
1511.content:
Her boots, clicked and clacked against the wet pavement. Her brown hair, flew with the wind, and her clothing covered every part of her body. The assistant understood, that her feet needed to be protected, and she kept a pair of black jeans on, along with a shirt, that was covered by her signature dark grey sweater. The only uncovered parts of her body were her hands, and face, but that's all she would allow.

She walked and looked in the neighborhood, searching for a victim to practice on, her search lasted half of an hour. When she spotted a girl, who was completely covered, even her face was covered from the air. The unknown girl was sitting on a flight of stairs that was in front of a house. The mysterious girl had seen the assistant, and waved her covered arm.

The assistant out of instinct, waved back. For an assistant of the witch, she was quite bubbly and kind, that many wouldn't consider her to take the witch's side. The assistant walked over to her, with a happy go lucky attitude. She approached the covered girl.

"Hi there, I know that I'm a stranger, but can I go into your house to warm up, I'm freezing." The assistant asked, making it up as she went along.

"It is quite cold, isn't it?" The mysterious girl said, with a calm voice.

"Yes, it is cold, but why are you out here, when it's warm inside?" The assistant's curiosity peeked.

"Oh, before that damned witch plagued us, I was happily living with my husband, and daughter. My life was absolutely perfect.... Then it happened, my husband and daughter went to the back to swim, while I decided to stay inside, and watch a little T.V." She stopped, and took a deep breath. The assistant was interested, and decided to listen. "While I was sitting there, I heard laughing, and joy from outside. They were having a blast, ten minutes later, I heard a scream, then followed by laughter. At the time, I thought nothing of it, and when I looked out there, I saw my daughter laying on the floor in hysterics. While my husband was nowhere to be found." She stopped again, giving a deep sigh.

"What happened to your daughter?" She asked with sincerity.

"She yelled at me that something was tickling her feet, which was strange. When I stepped out there, I felt tingling in my feet, and I couldn't stop smiling. The feeling was intense, I looked down at my bare feet, wondering what was going on. My daughter then suddenly disappeared in front of me, as I just heard the echo of her laugh. So now I sit out here, and wish to go back to the days, when I could feel the grass between my toes. I still wish...." She looked down at the wet grass, most of it was dead, but her memory of seeing green was still there.

"Sorry, to hear about that...." She felt sorry for her loss.

"It's alright, that was ten years ago. Oh! Sorry, you're cold, please step inside. A guest hasn't visited me in a quite awhile." The covered woman stood up, and continued inside, motioning her to come inside.
1511.title: The Assistant's Choice

choices: The Assistant Wakes Up In A Bedroom Tied Down....
The Assistant Wakes Up In The Living Room....
15113.content:
As the assistant entered this woman's home, it felt warm, and inviting. The place was roomy for more than one person, as she was led into the living room, she sat on the couch. The clothed woman slipped off one of her many jackets, and set the fireplace, bringing more warmth to the living room.

"This is a nice place." The assistant complimented and slipped off her jacket as well from the warmth. She saw the mysterious woman take off another sweater, and finally revealed her face, arms and hands. She only had a shirt, along with a scarf as she unwrapped, revealing her whole face.

"Much better, now we can properly meet, I'm Christie." She walked towards the assistant lifting her hand for a proper shake.

"Just call me assistant, please don't ask." She said sounding a little suspicious, while reaching her hand towards christie's bare hand, and shook, then pulling away.

Christie raised a brow, but didn't want to pest her about her name. As she stood there, and smiled. "So, you want hot chocolate, or tea?" Christie asked straight forward to the point.

"What... oh, I'll take tea, please." The assistant said confused about her quick response.

"Okay, just give me a quick minute." She said, and disappeared into the kitchen, and hearing the sound of silverware, and glass. While christie prepared the drinks, she spoke to the assistant wanting to continue their talk. "What brings you here?"

She heard christie's voice from the kitchen, and also heard clinks of glass. "I'm passing through, just looking for something that I'm not sure of." She said, thinking of her true task, but felt guilty upon it.

"Oh.... so you're like a traveler, I take it." Christie tried to guess, as she finished the drinks.

The assistant nodded, and looked at the fire. "Yeah, something close to those areas, but yeah..." She didn't want to talk about it, even she seemed lost, and confused. Her real name was many things, but she never told anyone for some apparent reason.

“Hmmm…. so you’re traveling looking for something, and your name’s assistant?” Christie replied back, while walking into the living room, carrying drinks, and handing her tea to the assistant.

The assistant only nodded and took a drink, the tea was warm the instant it touched her throat soothing her body from the coldness outside. “Yeah…. I’m a strange one.”

Christie sat in front of her giving a warm smile, and drank her tea as well. “Indeed, but I don’t judge, only that you do cause a bit of suspicion, if I say so myself.” She informed her, taking another sip from the tea.

The assistant thought of her observation, and wondered why she let her in then. “If I’m a suspicious figure to you, why did you let me in?” She took another drink of the tea.

She remained silent for a moment pondering on the question, and sat back in her seat giving a look of interest. “Because how else do I find out more about a person, if I don’t let them warm up, or show my hospitality.” She smiled more warmly after that response.

The assistant noticed her attitude change slightly to a more happy tone, she felt a bit tired as she gave a yawn, and looked at christie, returning a smile. Christie just crossed her legs, as she noticed the girl give off a yawn.

“Tired…. feeling sleepy?” Christie teased taking a sip, now acting more weird than before. Her smile stayed on her face, while she sat there, as if she was waiting for a signal.

The assistant noticed this right away, as she looked at her more concerned than ever, as her body felt heavy. Her eyes began to droop, while she struggled to hold herself up. “What….. did….yo…” She faintly said, as her body slumped over dropping the cup. Her body fell from the couch, onto the floor looking up, and seeing a blurry figure stand over her, realizing that this wasn’t a good situation to be in, before closing her eyes, and falling asleep.
15113.title: The Assistant Waits.....

choices: A Grey Mist Comes Out Of The Box.....
A Creature Of Some Sort Comes Out Of The Box.....
151132.content:
The Assistant slowly opens her eyes, and notices she is stripped to her bra, and panties. The warm fire is still going, as she hears the fire crackling. She looks around the room to see she’s still in the living room, but is tied to the couch with her feet tied to the table. Her feet are bare, and out in the opening, she’s also been gagged so she can’t make a sound as she felt a moist sock in her mouth, and knowing it’s hers. She shook in disgust, and tried spitting it out, only to be stopped by duct tape holding it there.

After a couple of minutes of sitting there helpless, steps could be heard getting closer to her, and shaking in fear from what might happen. Christie entered the room with her same smile, humming a tune to herself. She held a small wooden box that fit in her hand, and sat in front of the assistant giggling at her helpless friend.

“Glad to see that you’re awake.” Christie happily said, while placing the box down on the table. “I hope you don’t mind me taking your clothes off, and making you comfortable, but those clothes looked unbearable on you, even your shoes, so I took them off too, leaving your bare feet to rest on the table, and might I say, you have very cute feet, especially those toes.” Christie stated while rubbing the assistants toes in a smooth motion, causing the assistant to enjoy the feeling.

The assistant attempted to speak, but all that could be heard was muffled sounds, and the occasional loud sound. The assistant tried moving, but nothing worked, even her feet were bound to the table by strong rope.

“Tsk, tsk…. don’t do that, not if you want to be tortured.” She said giving a sly grin, as the assistant halted, knowing full well what she meant. “Good, now I’m going to ask you questions, but you have to answer them honestly, or else….” She paused giving a dramatic effect.

The assistant knew to cooperate, so she nodded her head in agreement.

“I’ll ask yes or no questions, and we’ll go from there. Here we go.” She sat back against the couch, giving a look of determination. “Are you really passing through, or no that was a lie? Yes means you are, no means you’re a liar.” She asked, watching closely.

The assistant hesitated for a bit, but decided to lie to her, and nodded yes, but quickly saw Christie jump to her feet and lightly scratched her soles, her toes curled twitching to the itching fingers playing on her soft soles, causing her to cackle and try to kick as her feet were only teased, not experiencing actual tickling.

“Don’t lie, I know a lie, when I see it.” Christie stopped scratching her fingers lightly on the assistants feet and sat back thinking of more questions. “Okay, is your name really assistant?”

The assistant was caught it was and wasn’t, but for the most part it was. So she nodded, and Christie slowly stretched her hands over to her feet, inching forward teasing her, as they hovered over the air. The assistant shook her up and down furiously speaking the truth about it.

Christie noticed her face, and saw that her look meant it was the truth, she sat back and smiled. “Now then, have you seen this box before?” Christie lifted the small box, and smiled kissing the wooden box.

She eyed it, and tilted her head at the strange item, she shook her head no at Christie, and her heart began to race, fearing it. Wondering that questioning time was already over.

Christie smiled deviously, and placed the wooden box in front of her bare feet. “Well, you’re in for a treat, this box contains a creature that loves to tickle exposed areas, and as you’ve noticed you’re almost naked.” Christie paused looking at the box, and her seeing the connection of what the assistant had exposed which was almost everything. “I figured you’d be a perfect candidate for this box, but I think we’re both about to learn what’s inside, good luck, assistant.” Christie pulled on the latch and stepped back, as the box’s lid started to crack open.

The assistant stared in fear, her bare sensitive feet were in front of the box, that could contain anything that could easily get her. She tried pulling on her bonds, but only failed seeing the lid trying to push itself open.
151132.title: The Assistant Wakes Up In The Living Room....

info.brief_description: A cursed world, a place full of tickling, a few ticklish girls who try to escape the curse
info.description:
The world is cursed; only girls who are under 28 are left; other people are either dead or sent to another world. It is okay to conclude that these girls are cursed, as they are all limited by the curse. They are cursed to be ticklish; they are cursed to be cute; they are cursed to stay young and immortal. It does not sound like they are cursed but blessed; however, to these girls, the curse is the most cruel thing in the world. Under the curse, the girls are ticklish everywhere, especially feet. Same time, the air is cursed to tickle their feet once exposed. Besides, if the girls expose their bare feet in the air for over 72 hours, they will be damned to the "tickle hell", in which they are restrained and tickled for all the life. Since they are immortal, the tickle hell is a lot worth than death. The curse also states that pain is no more, on the other hand, pain is replaced by tickle. Different creatures appear because of the curse, and all of them are born only for tickling the girls.
What will the girls do about it? You will decide!

No killing
No guys
Tickling only, but fetish stuff is okay
*/F is encouraged.
Please follow the background
Please add qualitative chapters
info.pretty_title: That's why you don't lose your shoes
